about_the_game:
☆Yasogaya Murder Cases☆
Playing as Jack Kaita, a delinquent high schooler, when a set of murders occur at his town, he gets interested to play detective leading him into a dark and dangerous road of hardships, acknowledgement, and ultimately Jack's path to understand who he truly is.

CREDITS

C0lonnello - Lead Programmer, game design

@pinacchos - Lead artist, illustrator

DY3-thx12-4432 - Lead Composer / Davide Perico - Sound Design

Pseudo64 - Writer/ Level Design/ Game Design

tvstar1999 - Translator

SeagullRider - Graphic Designer/ Art Direction

gipugs - Animator

RanleeK - Animator (Twitter)

Tylegomaniac - Animator

MiddleBear - Environment



Play as Jack in the rural town of Yasogaya, as his story unfolds! A singleplayer fighting game where you can do a set of things in this small town!
-Explore around the rural town and meet all sorts of people leading you to side missions and side stories, in all sorts of genres!
-Beat delinquent gangs and bikers up by engaging in street fights, carve everyone's skulls in!
-Play through the main story, fighting many bosses and battle stages the plot offers! From a midnight high school brawl to rich offices!
-Take notes and play detective asking around townsfolk about the murders!
-Go through unique gameplay sections through levels and stages like a stealth section sneaking into the school, looking for your teacher's diary or running from a mysterious chained man!
-Play minigames around the town and work at part-time jobs!

Through beating up gangs and thugs, running around the streets and helping your classmates play through this high school murder mystery as Jack tries to uncover the culprit behind this conspiracy!
Yasogaya Murder Cases is intended to be played by a controller, for the best gameplay experience!
